contentList.content: Choose whether or not your Spectral Tentacle can act without being commanded.
Your Spectral Tentacle does not act unless commanded.
Your Spectral Tentacle can act without being commaned.

An entity of an otherworldly sea now allows you to draw on its thalassic power. Is it merely using you to learn about terrestrial realms, or does it want you to open cosmic floodgates and drown the world?

Conjure a Spectral Tentacle that can strike at your foes.
The tentacle does nothing on its own. It can only take an action if you command it.
The amount of times you can use this is based on your Proficiency Bonus, refreshing after a Long Rest.

When commanded, the Tentacle can move up to 12m, deal [1], and reduces the enemy's Movement Speed by 3m.
Enemies will ignore the tentacle and the tentacle cannot be harmed.

Give an order to your Spectral Tentacle, allowing it to move up to 9m and make a melee attack on its turn.
The tentacle gains an Attack bonus based on your Proficiency Bonus and Charisma Modifier.

Conjure a Spectral Tentacle that can strike at your foes.
The Tentacle can move up to 9m, deal [1], and reduces the enemy's Movement Speed by 3m.
Enemies will ignore the tentacle and the tentacle cannot be harmed.
The amount of times you can use this is based on your Proficiency Bonus, refreshing after a Long Rest.
Creature has been given a command, allowing it to take action.

Tentacle receives <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FW_TotD_TENTACLECOMMAND">Orders</LSTag> when summoned and is able to act immedietly as though <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="FW_TotD_CommandTentacle">Commanded</LSTag>.
Dive below and reappear at a position within range.
Lash out at an enemy to deal [1] and reduce their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> by 3m.
Creature's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is reduced by 3m.

Your Tentacle of the Deep can defend you or your allies.
You can use your Reaction to protect ally within 3m of it, reducing the damage they take by [1].
Command your tentacle to put itself between an ally and harm's way, reducing the damage that ally takes by 1d8.
Command your tentacle to put itself between an ally and harm's way, reducing the damage that ally takes by 2d8.
Creature is within 3m of the Tentacle of the Deep and can be protected from damage.
You can choose to use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to protect an ally that is within 3m of your Spectral Tentacal to reduce the damage they take.
Gain +3m of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> while on a water-based surface.

Conjure waves of water at your foes.
Once cast, you can recast weaker versions of the same spells for the next 10 turns without expending a Spell Slot.
Leaves a body of water at target locations.
You can recast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="FW_ControlWater_Container">Control Water</LSTag> without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.

Conjure a whirpool that deals [1] and sucks creatures in. Anyone that fails a <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> has their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> halved.

Conjure a powerful wave that crashes down in an area, creatures hit must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or take [1] and be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Conjure [1] pillars of water that each deal [2] to creatures who fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Deals an extra [1] damage per level.

Summon a massive 9m radius sphere centered on a point you can see within range that lasts up to 10 turns.
The area becomes difficult terrain and any creature that starts their turn in there must succeed a DC19 Strength Saving Throw or take [1] and be pulled 3ft towards the center.
Creature is being battered and blown by a powerful maelstrom.

Cause numbing frost to form on an enemy. Unless they succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, they take [1] and are afflicted with Numbing Cold.
Creature has disadvantage on their next attack roll.
Create a burst of thunderous sound, creatures within 2m that fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take [1].

Gain Evard's Black Tentacles as a Warlock spell and Evard's Deep Sea Tentacles as a Long Rest Spell.
When you cast either Spell, gain Temporary Hit Points based on your Warlock Class Level. Moreover, damage can't break your Concentration on these spells.

Create a puddle of churning water beneath a creature for 2 turns. If the creature moves willingly, they must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> and take [1].
Creature is standing in a puddle of churning water
Call forth an elemental spirit to fight for you. These elemental spirits are weaker than those conjured by Conjure Elemental.
Elemental spirits have an Unarmed Attack, Multiattack, and Movement Ability. All summons are immune to poison.
Call forth a fire elemental to fight for you. Its attacks deal fire damage and it has Fire Immunity and Acid Resistance.
Call forth a water elemental to fight for you. Its attacks deal bludgeoning damage and it has Acid Resistance.
Call forth an earth elemental to fight for you. Its attacks deal bludgeoning damage and it has Slashing and Piercing Resistance.
Call forth an air elemental to fight for you. Its attacks deal bludgeoning damage and it has Lightning and Thunder Resistance.
Vanish and reappear at a location within 18m.
